label: Behavior 09542402
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 54.105278 + 0.00012 × t + 0.00003 × t², lon(t) ≈ 9.32976 - 0.00002 × t - 0.00001 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
